release_notes:
ðŸ”§ Version 1.2.6 - Fixed Incremental Update System

âœ… Fixed Issues:
- Incremental updates now work correctly for single-file executables
- Downloads just the .exe (127 MB) instead of trying to replace individual files
- Uses smart updater script to safely replace executable after app closes

ðŸ“Š Bandwidth Savings:
- Incremental update: 127 MB (10% smaller than full installer)
- Full installer: 141 MB
- Savings: 14 MB + no installer overhead

ðŸš€ How It Works:
1. App downloads new LRU_Tracker.exe in background
2. Smart updater script launches when you click 'Restart'
3. Script waits for app to close
4. Backs up old .exe, installs new one
5. Automatically restarts updated app
6. Cleans up backup files

âœ¨ User Experience:
- Faster updates (direct exe download)
- Automatic backup and rollback on errors
- Seamless restart process
- No manual installation needed

ðŸ“¦ If you're on v1.2.4 or v1.2.5:
- Update will download 127 MB (new strategy)
- Still faster than downloading full installer
- Update completes automatically on restart
